resources.string: SmartTourism needs connection to Internet in the smartphone and the activation of the ubication to the user; if not the application will not work correctly.
SmartTourism v1.0 hashas been developed by Ana María Guzmán López for the Final Project of Computer Engineering, in High School Engineering of University of Cádiz.
Would you like filtering the restaurants by your opinion?
Would you like filtering the touristic offers by your opinion?
Would you like add number of seating that you need?
From highest to lowest score cleaning
There is not any nearby touristic offers your location and corresponding with your selected preferences.
If you wish see touristic offers we offer, you select No in the pop-up.

If you wish see restaurants we offer, you select No in the pop-up.

If you have any question, you should contact with our general support. You send an email in the next table to:
Can people read my private information?
How do I access to SmartTourism fron my Android device?
How do I access to SmartTourism fron my Iphone device?
How do I access to SmartTourism fron my Tablet device?
We feel that you are not happy with our service. We strive to provide a complete and suitable service to our users. We will improve it.
If you want to close your account, you will send an email to technical support and your information will be deleted. On the other hand, you shoud be uninstall SmartTourism of your device.
Privacity and security are the main priorities SmartTourism.
We do not provide personal informatio to any application users, external company, people...
Smart Tourism gets information from restaurants and touristic offers of Cadiz.
For example, the application gets of the restaurants: name, location, description, capacity, type of restaurant, type of food served...
And the touristic offers: name, location, description, advance booking...

In addition, the user saves and sees his personal information and the factors which will determine the methods of filtering and sorting of restaurants and touristic offers, from the Preferences in My Account.

SmartTourism can be used in two languages: Spanish and English. The language is the same as the device. If you want to change it, you should access the device settings and change there for the desired.

En caso que el dispositivo posea un idioma diferente de estos dos, el idioma de la aplicación será por defecto el Inglés. If the device has a different language, the language of the application will be for Spanish default.
It is required that device to access the Internet and the location is activated.
My account is the area where the user indicates your preferences to show the restaurants and touristic offers more suited to the preferences him. Thanks to your account, it will be easy for you:
- To know the location where you are and providing the nearest locations.
- To manage restaurants whose capacity, location ... are more suited to your preferences and needs.
- To manage the most suitable touristic offers to your needs.
- To manage your account settings and preferences.
My account is a private page, so only you can know your information. If you want to make it public, you can share through social networks with Sharing.
Currently, there is a single version of SmartTourism, which can install on Android devices. You should download SmartTourism the Play Store and install it.
This application is improving, so it will be convenient to update it every time you receive a notification.
Currently this application is developing, so there is not a version that accesses from iPhone devices. A future improvements, it is to create a version that is supported by these devices.
Currently this application is developing, so there is not a version that accesses from Tablets. A future improvements, it is to create a version that is supported by these devices.
SmartTourism allows the user to know all our restaurants and touristic offers of the area, providing information on each of them.
Also, the application shows the location of the restaurant or touristic offer, which the user is queried and the distance which is the same.
To manage the most appropriate places the user, SmartTourism uses the methods of sorting and filtering.
To sort places by proximity to the user´s current location.
SmartTourism sees a meteorologic service in that location and depending on the result, the application filtera those outdoor touristic offers and restaurants with terrace.
Also, the user can fill your preferences in restaurants or touristic offers, with the objective of showing the most similar places to the likes of him.
